p: FMT is effective in multiple gastrointestinal diseases such as CDI, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), IBD, and CRC [ 67, 68]. For instance, in the case of recurrent CDI, it reached the effectiveness of over 80% even after a single treatment [ 69]. There is a reason to believe that it could achieve similar efficiency in IBD as well. However, the exact composition of the transplant from a healthy donor in many cases remains undescribed.
